excerpt: Majestic 16th-century castle constructed over an ancient fort, offering expansive views & a museum.
detail_description: Marmaris Castle and Archeology Museum is a must-visit destination for history enthusiasts. Situated on the site of the ancient Marmaris Castle, this 16th-century structure offers breathtaking views and houses a fascinating museum. The castle has a rich history, believed to have been initially built by the Ionians in 1044 BC and later expanded during Suleyman the Magnificent's reign in 1522.
name: Marmaris Castle and Archeology Museum
address: Tepe, 30. Sk No:54, 48700 Marmaris/Muğla, Türkiye

detail_description: Setur Netsel Marmaris Marina is a stunning and popular attraction in Marmaris. The marina is surrounded by picturesque mountains, offering a beautiful setting for leisurely walks along the esplanade. Colorful boats with Turkish flags line the clear blue waters, creating a charming atmosphere. The walkways are adorned with flower beds, fountains, and sculptures, while an array of bars, restaurants, and shops provide ample entertainment options.
name: Setur Netsel Marmaris Marina
address: Sarıana, M.Münir Elgin Bulvarı 38/2, 48700 Marmaris/Muğla, Türkiye

detail_description: The Grand Bazaar in Marmaris is a bustling hub for avid shoppers. Situated at the heart of the city, it offers an array of local shops and boutiques where visitors can find souvenirs and various items. The lively atmosphere and opportunity to haggle with shopkeepers make it an exciting experience. It's recommended to visit earlier in the day to avoid crowds, but regardless of when you go, you're likely to find great deals on a variety of goods.
name: Bazaar
address: Tepe, Yeniyol Cd. No:26, 48700 Marmaris/Muğla, Türkiye

excerpt: Marmaris is a Mediterranean resort town along the Turkish Riviera (also known as the Turquoise Coast) with a busy, pebbly beach and long seafront promenade. It’s known for its lively nightlife on Bar Street, which is home to open-air clubs and music venues. Marmaris sits in a valley between pine-forested mountains and clear waters, which are popular sailing and diving destinations.
detail_description: Marmaris, located on the Turkish Riviera, is a bustling resort town with a pebbly beach and a lively seafront promenade. The famous Bar Street offers vibrant nightlife with open-air clubs and music venues. Surrounded by pine-forested mountains and clear waters, Marmaris is popular for sailing and diving. This enchanting destination combines natural beauty with rich history, offering diverse cultural, recreational, and culinary experiences for all travelers to enjoy.
name: Marmaris
address: Muğla, Türkiye

detail_description: Back Street Bar is a popular spot located in Marmaris Bar Street, known for its vibrant nightlife and diverse entertainment options. The area offers a wide array of late-night venues, including nightclubs and bars that cater to various music genres and provide opportunities for dancing. Additionally, visitors can find upscale restaurants and beach bars with a more tranquil ambiance, perfect for those seeking a romantic setting by the Mediterranean Sea.
name: Back Street Bar
address: Tepe, 39. Sk. No:123, 48700 Marmaris/Muğla, Türkiye

excerpt: Family-friendly waterpark featuring slides, pools & mini-golf, plus restaurants & bars.
detail_description: Atlantis Water Park is a top family-friendly destination in Marmaris, located at the Siteler region right on the seafront. It offers a range of attractions suitable for all ages, including water slides, pools, and mini-golf. Visitors can also enjoy restaurants and bars within the park. Additionally, Atlantis provides a private beach with complimentary sun beds and umbrellas.
name: Atlantis Water Park
address: Siteler, Uzunyalı Cad No:209, 48700 Marmaris/Muğla, Türkiye

detail_description: Marmaris Public Beach, located in the heart of Marmaris, offers a beautiful setting with views of lush green hills and the sea. The beach provides essential amenities such as toilets, showers, and changing cabins. While the sand is mostly dry clay and not fine white sand, visitors can still enjoy the serene atmosphere and watch giant cruise ships passing by. The beach also boasts excellent facilities including showers, changing areas, and toilets.
name: Marmaris Public Beach
address: No:, Çıldır, Atatürk Cd. No:28, 48700 Marmaris/Muğla, Türkiye

detail_description: In the heart of Marmaris, Turkey, lies Youth Square, a vibrant plaza that replaced a dilapidated building. At the center of this square is the Dancing Fountain, featuring two basins that come to life with an automated light and music show at 9:00 pm and 10:00 pm during peak season. What appears as a serene fountain during the day transforms into a lively hub for music and entertainment at night.
name: Dancing Fountain
address: Kemeraltı, 48700 Marmaris/Muğla, Türkiye

detail_description: Günnücek, also known as Marmaris National Park, is a popular destination for those seeking an unspoiled natural environment and fresh air. Visitors can stroll along wooden pathways in the forest, surrounded by the sounds of birds and the invigorating scent of pine. Conveniently located near Marmaris, it offers easy access for a day trip or extended stay. The park features an adults-only resort with a private cove and marina offering crystal clear waters.
name: Günnücek (Marmaris National Park)
address: Sarıana, Mustafa Münir Elgin Blv., 48700 Marmaris/Muğla, Türkiye

excerpt: Big holiday resort water park with slides, tunnels, swimming & wave pools, plus a restaurant & bar.
detail_description: Aqua Dream Water Park is a sprawling 44,000m2 holiday resort water park in Marmaris, Turkey. It offers a variety of slides, tunnels, swimming and wave pools suitable for all ages. From adrenaline-fueled rides like the Kamikaze to more leisurely options, there's something for everyone. The park also features a top-notch restaurant serving delicious bites from seafood to kebabs.
name: Aqua Dream Water Park
address: Şirinyer Mahallesi, Fatih Sultan Mehmet Cd., 48706 Marmaris/Muğla, Türkiye

detail_description: Embark on the Marmaris Jeep Safari for an exhilarating adventure through the stunning landscapes of Marmaris. Join a convoy of 3-10 Jeeps and enjoy activities like water cannon fights along off-road routes, experiencing dusty and wet paths. The tour includes stops at points of interest, allowing you to interact with locals and gain insight into their lifestyle.
name: Marmaris Jeep Safari
address: 187 no No:9 Can2 Apt., 48700 Marmaris/Muğla, Türkiye

detail_description: Aqua Life Boat Daily Tours offers a variety of daily boat trips departing from Marmaris marina. These tours cater to different preferences, including family tours, moonlight tours, and special occasion celebrations. There are also halal-friendly options with a female captain available. Guests have praised the friendly hosts and relaxing atmosphere on board, along with the opportunity to meet new people.
name: Aqua Life Boat Daily Tours
address: Tepe, Kordon Cd., 48700 Marmaris/Muğla, Türkiye

detail_description: Marmaris Public Square Old Town Basar is a vibrant area that offers a mix of historical charm and modern attractions. Visitors can explore the Old Town, Marmaris Castle, and the marina with its picturesque bridge and impressive boats. The area is also known for its lively nightlife, with Bar Street offering an array of restaurants and open-air nightclubs where locals gather to enjoy refreshing drinks and even try a shisha pipe.
name: Marmaris Public Square Old Town Basar
address: Tepe, 48700 Marmaris/Muğla, Türkiye

excerpt: Turkish specialties served for dinner, alongside a show of folk & belly dancing & traditional music.
detail_description: Turkish Night Marmaris offers a delightful experience of Turkish culture and cuisine. Guests can enjoy traditional Turkish specialties while being entertained by folk and belly dancing, accompanied by soulful Turkish music. The event provides an opportunity to immerse oneself in the warmth of the sea, savor delicious Turkish delicacies, and witness the friendliness of the Turkish people. Additionally, it is conveniently located near a pristine sandy beach and the Marmaris Atlantis Waterpark for added leisure options.
name: Turkish Night Marmaris
address: Armutalan, 48706 Marmaris/Muğla, Türkiye

detail_description: The Ottoman Turkish Bath is a must-visit experience for tourists in Marmaris, offering top-notch cleanliness, relaxation, and historical rituals. Visitors can enjoy an hour of traditional rubdown with soap, fragrant oils, and hot water administered by expert masseurs. Additionally, physiotherapy massages are available for both men and women. The bath also offers volcanic stone treatments for those seeking a more intense experience.
name: Ottoman Turkish Bath
address: Kemeraltı, Eski Datça Yolu No:74, 48700 Marmaris/Muğla, Türkiye

detail_description: Karting Park Marmaris Go Kart is a must-visit for go-kart enthusiasts, featuring a 500-meter-long track that's one of the largest in the area. Located just 15 minutes from Marmaris City Center, this 24-hour site offers an exhilarating experience with breathtaking views from atop a mountain. Visitors can enjoy intense fun with practice laps and then 20 thrilling laps around the track.
name: Karting Park Marmaris Go Kart
address: Şirinyer mahallesi, fatih sultan mehmet han caddesi no:8/a, 48700 Marmaris/Muğla, Türkiye

detail_description: Marmaris Jeep Safari is an exhilarating way to explore the stunning landscape around Marmaris. The guided tours take you through off-grid corners, fruit orchards, lush gardens, Byzantine churches, and secluded beaches. One of the highlights is Seven Springs, a shaded area with peacocks. These popular tours offer opportunities for water cannon fights and photo ops at breathtaking vantage points. It's a highly recommended experience that includes everything from thrilling activities to souvenir photos and lunch on site.
name: Marmaris Jeep Safari
address: Çıldır, 165. Sk. No:9 D:1, 48700 Marmaris/Muğla, Türkiye

detail_description: Embark on an exhilarating adventure with the Quad and Buggy Safari in Marmaris. Feel the rush of adrenaline as you navigate through muddy, wet, and dusty off-road paths on a powerful quad bike. Traverse pine forests, take breaks to soak in the serene landscape, and marvel at the stunning scenery. This fast-paced experience also includes visits to attractions like Turgut waterfalls for an unforgettable journey.
name: Quad and Buggy Safari
address: Çıldır, 199. Sk. No:2/4, 48706 Marmaris/Muğla, Türkiye

name: Marmaris Bay
address: Tepe, Marmaris Muğla Yolu, 48700 Marmaris/Muğla, Türkiye

detail_description: Club Areena, established in 2004, is the largest open-air nightclub in Marmaris and a hotspot for party enthusiasts. It has gained popularity for hosting renowned DJs and attracting Turkish celebrities. The club offers an exhilarating atmosphere with laser shows, dance performances, and live events. With a capacity of 2000 people, it stands out on Bar Street with its modern design and multiple dance areas.
name: Club areena
address: Hacimustafa sk. No.125 barlar sokagi, Tepe, 48700 Marmaris/Muğla, Türkiye

detail_description: In Marmaris, the bustling bazaars offer a wide array of Turkish goods including ceramics, traditional tea, lamps, rugs, spices and fragrances. Visitors can also explore designer label items while immersing themselves in the vibrant market atmosphere.
name: Things to do in Marmaris
address: Siteler, Durmazlar Cd. No:27, 48706 Marmaris/Muğla, Türkiye

detail_description: Pamukkale Turizm Marmaris Otogar, located in the southwestern part of Turkey, is a popular destination known for its stunning white terraces that resemble a snowfield amidst lush surroundings. The company has been a trusted choice for 76 years and continues to grow. While the bus station is described as sweet and surrounded by greenery, some visitors note that there is a fee to use the restroom.
name: Pamukkale Turizm Marmaris Otogar
address: Sarıana, Mustafa Münir Elgin Blv. No:7/33 D:34, 48700 Marmaris/Muğla, Türkiye

name: Sky Spa & Fitness - Turkish bath (hammam) and Massage (Premier Nergis Beach Hotel)
address: Premier Nergis Beach Hotel, Siteler, 48700 Marmaris/Muğla, Türkiye

detail_description: Kapurcuk House of Culture and Gastronomy is a unique place that aims to preserve the culture and history of Marmaris. It offers a glimpse into endangered recipes, obsolete jobs, and fading traditions. Visitors can experience local Marmaris cookies, desserts, and other products while immersing themselves in a museum-like environment. The shop also sells various local products such as olive oil, pine honey, fragrant aromatic soaps, and pine air soda.
name: KAPURCUK HOUSE OF CULTURE AND GASTRONOMY
address: Tepe, 43. Sk. No.28/A, 48700 Marmaris/Muğla, Türkiye

excerpt: Armutalan is a neighbourhood of the municipality and district of Marmaris, Muğla Province, Turkey. Its population is 23,636. Before the 2013 reorganisation, it was a town. It is merged to Marmaris to the southeast. The distance to Muğla is 49 kilometres. Up to recent times Armutalan was a small settlement. Wikipedia.
detail_description: Armutalan, located in the Muğla Province of Turkey, is a neighborhood within the Marmaris municipality. Formerly a town before being merged with Marmaris, it now boasts a population of 23,636. Situated to the southeast of Marmaris, it offers convenient access to the lively nightlife and various attractions in the area.
name: Armutalan
address: 48706 Marmaris/Muğla, Türkiye

detail_description: Fellini Cafe Restoran, situated at Barbaros Cad No. 71, is a popular spot in Marmaris known for its extensive selection of fish and seafood. The restaurant offers a pleasant outdoor terrace and features a menu that combines Turkish and European cuisine. Overlooking the marina, this eatery provides excellent food, a vibrant atmosphere, and top-notch service. Specializing in seafood, Fellini's gourmet offerings include dishes like steak a la cre and steak in cognac sauce.
name: Fellini Cafe Restoran
address: Tepe, Barbaros Cd. No:63, 48700 Marmaris/Muğla, Türkiye

detail_description: Cousin's Steak House is a delightful dining destination that promises an enjoyable experience for both food lovers and those looking to unwind with a drink. Renowned for its expertly cooked steaks, the menu also features an enticing array of Turkish, Italian, British, and other European dishes. Guests rave about the affordability of meals, especially the steak options which come complete with rice, chips, and salad at a fantastic price.
name: COUSIN'S STEAK HOUSE
address: Merkez Mahallesi, Armutalan, Yunus Nadi Cd. 207. Sokak, 48700 Marmaris/Muğla, Türkiye

name: Marmaris Buggy Safari
address: Armutalan, 209. Sk. No:12/c D:3, 48706 Marmaris/Muğla, Türkiye

excerpt: Stylish beachfront adults-only resort with mountain views, plus a spa & an outdoor pool.
detail_description: The Beachfront Hotel is a chic adults-only resort located on the beachfront in Marmaris. It offers stunning mountain views, a spa, and an outdoor pool. The hotel's design features whitewashed walls reminiscent of the old town, providing comfortable and spacious rooms with direct or angled views of the bay from private balconies. Its ideal location near the main road and facing a quiet beachside path makes it convenient for exploring the area.
name: The Beachfront Hotel
address: Çıldır, Uzunyali Mevkii No 38, 48700 Marmaris/Muğla, Türkiye

name: Marmaris Market
address: Tepe, Kordon Cd. No:4, 48700 Marmaris/Muğla, Türkiye

detail_description: Kircicegi is a top-notch restaurant in Marmaris, particularly popular among tourists due to its convenient location near the city center and beach. The eatery offers an array of delectable dishes at affordable prices. Their menu features enticing options such as Turkish shawarma, kebabs, pizza, pastries, and various types of manakish. These include cheese or minced meat with tomato sauce toppings. Additionally, they offer an assortment of salads and soups.
name: Kircicegi
address: Tepe, Kubilay Alpugan Sk. 8/A, 48700 Marmaris/Muğla, Türkiye

detail_description: 1919 Eat Drink Enjoy is a top-notch café in Marmaris known for its exceptional tea and delicious cookies that accompany their hot beverages. The cafe offers an interesting atmosphere, excellent service, and a variety of tasty coffee drinks, including an amazing cheesecake. Visitors can expect great quality coffee at reasonable prices, served by friendly English-speaking staff.
name: 1919 Cafe
address: Kemeraltı, 48700 Marmaris/Muğla, Türkiye

excerpt: Beldibi is a neighbourhood of the municipality and district of Marmaris, Muğla Province, Turkey. Its population is 11,278. Before the 2013 reorganisation, it was a town. It is situated in Marmaris national park. It is on Turkish state highway D.400 and merged to Marmaris. Its distance to Muğla is 47 kilometres. Wikipedia.
name: Beldibi
address: Marmaris/Muğla, Türkiye

name: Sunrise Restaurant & Bar
address: Çıldır, 207. Sk., 48700 Marmaris/Muğla, Türkiye

detail_description: Blackpool Bar is a great place for a night out with friends. The bar staff are often overcharged for drinks, but the change never seems to come so that can be frustrating. The drag artist Roxy was amazing and would definitely recommend going.
name: Blackpool Bar
address: Armutalan, Yunus Nadi Cd. No:32, 48706 Marmaris/Muğla, Türkiye

detail_description: Marmaris Long Beach, also known as Uzunyali Beach, is a popular spot with its long stretch of golden sands and clear waters. It's lined with hotels, bars, and restaurants offering free sun-loungers and umbrellas in exchange for purchasing refreshments. The beach is a hub for various marine activities organized by the municipality.
name: Marmaris Long Beach
address: No:, Siteler, 54. Sk., 48700 Marmaris/Muğla, Türkiye

name: Marmaris Burunucu Macera Parkı
address: Sarıana, Mustafa Münir Elgin Blv. No: 42/1, 48700 Marmaris/Muğla, Türkiye

detail_description: Located in the heart of Marmaris, Blue Port Shopping Centre is a popular destination for visitors seeking a wide range of shopping options. The mall houses around 45 international and local brands across 10 thousand square meters. Additionally, it features a top-floor food court with stunning views and affordable dining options. With three floors offering various amenities such as a cinema, kids' entertainment area, and local shops, the center provides an ideal retreat during inclement weather.
name: Blue Port
address: Siteler, Kemal Seyfettin Elgin Blv. No:47, 48700 Marmaris/Muğla, Türkiye

detail_description: When visiting Marmaris, indulging in the Armutalan Turkish Bath is an experience you simply cannot miss. This traditional hammam offers a unique glimpse into the rich Ottoman bathing culture that once captivated Sultans. As you step inside, you'll be enveloped by stunning architecture and serene interiors that transport you back in time. The bath experience itself is both revitalizing and relaxing, with various packages available to suit your preferences.
name: Armutalan Turkısh Bath
address: Camiavlu, 515. Sk. No:1, 48700 Marmaris/Muğla, Türkiye

detail_description: The Turkish Bath, also known as hammam, is a must-try experience in Turkey and particularly in Marmaris. It offers a revitalizing and relaxing way to immerse yourself in the Ottoman bathing tradition once practiced by Sultans. The specially designed facilities showcase stunning Ottoman architecture and interior design. This cleansing ritual not only purifies the skin but also helps release stress, leaving you feeling refreshed and tranquil.
name: Türkish Bath
address: Siteler, Kemal Seyfettin Elgin Blv. No:55, 48700 Marmaris/Muğla, Türkiye

detail_description: Quad Bike & Motorbike ATV Kiralama Marmaris Hüseyin Gencer offers an exciting opportunity for outdoor adventure enthusiasts to explore the local area on their own terms. Visitors have praised the excellent service and well-maintained quad bikes, noting that the staff are friendly and accommodating. The rental service is highly recommended for its fair prices, swift assistance, and a wide range of quality options available.
name: Quad Bike & Motorbike ATV Kiralama Marmaris Hüseyin Gencer
address: Çıldır, 164. Sk. no:11/Z-2, 48700 Marmaris/Muğla, Türkiye

name: Marmaris
address: Sarıana, 48700 Marmaris/Muğla, Türkiye

name: Solaris Shopping Center
address: Kemeraltı, Atatürk Cd. No:28, 48700 Marmaris/Muğla, Türkiye

detail_description: Beaches Bar is a stunning location with a mix of sandy and pebbled beaches, offering free sunbeds and umbrellas. The friendly staff encourage guests to purchase drinks and food while enjoying the facilities. Visitors feel very welcome in this magical setting.
name: Beaches Bar
address: Çıldır, 161. Sk. No:12, 48700 Marmaris/Muğla, Türkiye

detail_description: Netsel Marina in Marmaris is surrounded by a vibrant nightlife scene, with numerous bars, discos, and nightclubs to choose from. The area offers a variety of options for music and dancing, making it the perfect place to spend your holiday nights. The bars are conveniently located parallel to the Marina, catering to diverse tastes and ensuring an enjoyable experience for every visitor.
name: Netsel Marina
address: Sarıana, 48700 Marmaris/Muğla, Türkiye

detail_description: BackStreet Alaturca is a well-liked bar that offers a vibrant ambiance, excellent music, and amiable service. Its laid-back and inviting atmosphere makes it an ideal place to kick off the night and savor some beverages.
name: BackStreet Alaturca
address: Tepe, 39. Sk. No:123, 48100 Marmaris/Muğla, Türkiye

detail_description: D-Resort Grand Azur Beach Bar is situated on the Marmaris promenade, offering a beautiful bay and gentle entry into the water. The hotel provides a large number of sun lounges and parasols, creating a perfect spot for relaxation. Additionally, guests can easily access water transport rentals nearby. Upon arrival, the friendly reception staff efficiently checked in guests and provided helpful information about room amenities. The rooms are described as very nice and clean with comfortable mattresses.
name: D-Resort Grand Azur Beach Bar
address: Beach Bar, Siteler, Cumhuriyet Blv. No:17, 48700 Marmaris/Muğla, Türkiye

name: Mount Kozcakara
address: Karşıyaka, 48704 Marmaris/Muğla, Türkiye

name: Atatürk Heykeli
address: No:, Tepe, Kordon Cd. No:52, 48700 Marmaris/Muğla, Türkiye

excerpt: Shallow, sandy beach known for its clear water, with a restaurant plus lounger & umbrella rentals.
name: İncekum Plajı
address: Unnamed Road, Karaca, 48700 Marmaris/Muğla, Türkiye
